channel.title: Gaming cheats site?
channel.description: hi, im working on a site that is going to have lots of gaming cheats. what would be the easiest way to do it? use a database? because if i needed to change something on the site i would need to change every single page. does anyone no a site that could help me? thanks

item.title: Gaming cheats site?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:23, topic:214527”][quote author=belbn link=topic=282207.msg2308601#msg2308601 date=1214952561]

Like I care about your feelings, you’re on a RuneScape cheating website. Not a women’s Menstrual Cycle discussion site.

Way to go you faggot. Billy has a good point, dont go recreate a search engine [for example], it will just fail. No need to flame someone for having a different view. Go up to someone in real life and say they fail at life.
[/quote]

STFU.

Posts like this make me feel like shit. This is probably one of the worst possible times to post shit like this for me.

Stop clawing for sympathy, you just made yourself look like a nub.[/quote]

I don’t give a fuck what the hell you think. I can look like whatever to you. I did not claw for sympathy because I was being yelled at by 10 different people. You have no fucking clue about my life so stop acting like a fucktard fat ass who thinks he knows something. I am pissed off at everyone on this forum who think they know what the fuck they talk about when the don’t. You have to right to tell me anything or say anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Gaming cheats site?
item.dc:creator: @Red_Phat Red Phat
item.description:
@Red_Phat wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:14, topic:214527”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=282207.msg2292865#msg2292865 date=1214260601]

Don’t re-create the wheel. There are hundreds of these sites.

Let him do what he fucking wants.

I never said he could not do it or in anyway told him not to do it. I simply said there are hundreds of these sites and that he is creating the same one. Meaning there will not be much traffic considering there are better ones. Unless his site has something that other do not.

"Don’t re-create the wheel. "
Yeah you did.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 23, 2008, 12:34:38 AM[/size][hr][quote author=I james I link=topic=282207.msg2292186#msg2292186 date=1214219830]

either a database or xml files, but i’d go with the database

What do xml files do?

Does anyone no how I could get started?
[/quote]http://w3schools.com

I said wheel. Did I ever say the site?
[/quote]Wow, you’re fuckin’ stupid, ahaha.[/quote]

@ Pwnd = Billy Got Pwnd.
@ Billy = I 100% agree with that0ne6uy. Gee tee eff oh.

item.title: Gaming cheats site?
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

talking about recreating the wheel. It may be useless for traffic, but it’s good for exp.
I made a webhosting system/control panel. Sure it had some bugs, was messy. I still learned lots from it. If I did it again, I would make it 100 times simpler.

Go ahead and make the site with php/mysql, but don’t expect to earn anything other than exp.

Read full topic

item.title: Gaming cheats site?
item.dc:creator: @wingsword97 wingsword97
item.description:
@wingsword97 wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:13, topic:214527”][quote author=wingsword97 link=topic=282207.msg2293143#msg2293143 date=1214270960]
Try using a CMS script. It may cost money but it is really useful. i’ve somewhat got one going at [removed, etc.] its pretty cool. It lacks some features but it should be good if you would let other people submit cheats as well.
[/quote]

Way to advertise. Do you even know what CMS stands for? Last time I checked it wasn’t Simple Machines Forum.[/quote]
Content management system…And i wasn’t advertising, my server is never up ftw…

Read full topic
